Posts.Content: Hi again, Sorry I've asked this question already and some kind ladies already replied but just looking for anyone who has received adjuvant perjeta along with Herceptin, and if so how they went about obtaining it.  I know its not licensed for adjuvant use in the UK as yet.  If anyone knows any updates on this also I'd be most grateful for any info or advice. Thanks again, Fiona xx
Posts.Title: Perjeta

Posts.Content: Hi there just looking for a bit of advice again from some of the lovely people on here. It's regarding Radiotherapy. My mum had a WLE and lymph node clearance in September. One of her margins wasn't clear but instead of further surgery at that ti
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy advice

Posts.Content: Hi there My mum has recently had her last chemo for breast cancer, she also had a 4.5cm tumour with 3 involved lymph nodes, grade 3, so I know how you are feeling.  Chemo can be hard going and it seems a lot stretched out in front of you  with surgery and then radiotherapy, my mum is the same we are just awaiting a surgery date now. But you will get through it, it is doable and you will see light at the end of the tunnel, it is such a lot to take in especially when you have a little girl to think of also.  We have a way to go yet too,but I have found this site very supportive when I have needed advice and reassurance, everyone is very kind. Fingers crossed for you with your scans and good luck with your treatment, it will go in quickly once you get started. Very best wishes, love Fiona xx
